column4: Hi, I was over at a friends house, trying to install ubuntu on their computer, however I kept getting Error #5 :(
Can anybody explain what was the problem?
I know I should have used 9.10
but I didn't have that in range.
And figured I'd just update once it's installed.
it runs out of support in April I think though when 10.04 comes out
buy some new CD's?  and  do a nice clean install when 10.04 comes out?
overall 8.10 has been my favourite release since 8.04
of course I don't run it now though
